name: Dream Places
description:
This is my first game, so don't expect it to be perfect. It is a horror game where you as a player are in the liminal space or empty rooms (Dream Places), where you are being stalked by something until you see it.

You have to run away or you die. There WILL be 2 endings. For now, it's still in development. I can only publish Alpha 1 (v0.1.0).
